submittedToFrigatePlus.label: Submitted to Frigate+
submittedToFrigatePlus.tips:
You must first filter on tracked objects that have a snapshot.

Tracked objects without a snapshot cannot be submitted to Frigate+.

defaultView.title: Default View
defaultView.desc: When no filters are selected, display a summary of the most recent tracked objects per label, or display an unfiltered grid.

gridColumns.title: Grid Columns
gridColumns.desc: Select the number of columns in the grid view.

searchSource.label: Search Source
searchSource.desc: Choose whether to search the thumbnails or descriptions of your tracked objects.

selectDateBy.label: Select a date to filter by

loading.title: Loading
loading.desc: When the log pane is scrolled to the bottom, new logs automatically stream as they are added.

trackedObjectDelete.title: Confirm Delete
trackedObjectDelete.desc:
Deleting these {{objectLength}} tracked objects removes the snapshot, any saved embeddings, and any associated object lifecycle entries. Recorded footage of these tracked objects in History view will NOT be deleted.

Are you sure you want to proceed?

Hold the Shift key to bypass this dialog in the future.

recognizedLicensePlates.title: Recognized License Plates
recognizedLicensePlates.loadFailed: Failed to load recognized license plates.
recognizedLicensePlates.selectPlatesFromList: Select one or more plates from the list.
